html:
1.21.24  3:08 am   Do you believe that everything was already determined at the start of the universe?

      every possible way it could have gone, was determined, but that's infinite possible ways anyway so it doesn't even need determining. but the way it 'actually' goes, in the world we know here, is the continuing summation of all our choices, which are just a tiny sliver of that infinite possibility pool at any given time

1.21.24  12:28 am   have you played any rhythm games,

     i've tried waking up in the morning

      how was it if so

     bizarre

1.20.24  11:44 pm   I was not going to ask this question, but now that I think about it, am I going to ask this question?

      at the time of writing, yes

1.20.24  11:30 pm   are you on a quest to combine every artform?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.20.24  11:26 pm   do you ever wish you could see the reaction of the question-asker to the answer you provide, or is that superfluous to the objective of the questions page 

      that seems a little intrusive

1.20.24  10:41 pm   What if instead of participating to win an award, the reward itself was participation?

      in that case you wouldn't get it, due to not participating

1.20.24  10:34 pm   do you think tomorrow's lunch will be a good lunch? 

      it will meet the daily standard of lunch

1.20.24  10:15 pm   sometimes i feel like i'm living a reasonably bad timeline. i'm not achieving the things i should be achieving, and my life has been going downhill since the seventh grade. i'm basically being outcompeted by peers and... everyone, and i'm not catching up. where and when will the inflection point and minimum come? what will it take for me to do the things i know i'm capable of and i strongly believe are associated with my purpose in life? is it too late to accomplish or do the things i would like to accomplish or do, like learning new hobbies and master normal, proper human communication and leadership? is it possible to hop back onto a better timeline sometime in the future? can i seek redemption? i apologize for the heavy questions

      don't forget to take with you the wisdom you've accrued through this period of, what we'll call "ambitions processing". although i should point out that your assessment of your peers' achievements felt dubious, biased, and unbased. but who knows maybe you actually calculated it somehow

1.20.24  9:39 pm   I'm going to the airport terminal, tomorrow, will the planes be landing?

      likely yes, but that's still only half of the story

1.20.24  9:23 pm   what is an interesting thing to do in your free time

      go ahead and try to figure everything out

1.20.24  8:06 pm   what question did i ask again?

      this one

1.20.24  7:57 pm   have you already written what you believe is the last song you'll ever release?

      no

1.20.24  7:21 pm   How did you become a songwriter?

      started writing songs. that may sound easier than it is, but it's actually easier than it sounds. that being said, it's impossible

1.20.24  6:18 pm   Has your opinion on bread changed ever since 5.17.22?

      no, but let's be honest i'm not always forthcoming about my actual exact opinion on bread. bread has a silliness to it, as a subject, so it comes up a lot here in the questions, and i've experimented with lots of different types of responses. you may or may not have interpreted one of those responses as a hard opinion

1.20.24  4:47 pm   got any advice for managing a heavy workload? 

      [ed harris voice] the procedures!!!!!

1.20.24  4:37 pm   do you ever use sarcasm in your songs

      yep

1.20.24  3:03 pm   hey bill, i have a wonderful girlfriend but she is way more sophisticated than i'll ever be, and i feel like i have to be "more" in order to deserve to be with her sometimes. do i need to get over this feeling, and if so, how?

      you can talk about it with her. i'm sure that will probably be good

1.20.24  2:10 pm   Are there any sounds in dutch that aren't really used in english

     sure. "g" als in goed, geld, en gezellig

      (or any english sounds that aren't really used in dutch)? 

      "th" as in thing, three, and thousand. unless you consider the fact that english is used in heaping quantities, all over any normal dutch conversation, then those sounds indeed are there

1.20.24  1:50 pm   i used to play the piano for a few years, but in 2020 i lost interest during the pandemic after my piano lessons got cancelled. 4 years later i want to get back at playing piano, but im horribly slow at reading sheet music and my coordination is out of wack. what should i do?

      just start. i'm sure you won't be any worse than when you first started

1.20.24  1:28 pm   why does reading through my old notes make me feel like i just discovered time traveling

      because maybe you've never done anything like that before

1.20.24  11:56 am   We know your opinion ‽ on but what about ⸮

      not common, even in spanish. it's nice, but i'd be nervous about its cross-platform compatibility, due to its obscurity

1.20.24  9:21 am   Stars are just like fish, aren't they?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.20.24  8:55 am   whats your favourite button on the calculator

      =

1.20.24  8:08 am   i play and practise my scales when im in doubt. what do you do when youre in doubt?

      work on the work

1.20.24  6:37 am   That feeling of stepping outside the box to find...... another box. What the fuck?

      it's better than finding nothing

1.20.24  4:04 am   What percentage of statements are misinterpreted every day around the world?

      4%

1.20.24  3:16 am   Do you believe at some point every possible question will have been asked?

     not here, or to me, but ultimately yes

     If so do you think at some point every question will be answered

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.20.24  2:05 am   Recently I've felt discouraged by small things that wouldn't affect me before. Have you ever felt like this? Any idea how to grow past this? 

      yes, you have to offset this by figuring out what you are really excited about, and focus on that stuff more

1.20.24  1:31 am   Are you planning on doing any more interviews soon

      yes

1.20.24  1:29 am   If a crow flew up to you and offered you a trinket would you accept it

      no

1.19.24  11:36 pm   any book recommendations?

      yes, all of them are recommended

1.19.24  10:34 pm   What is the best way to cook/prepare a potato and why?

      i actually don't know any ways

1.19.24  10:24 pm   what if fishermen controlled the government without us even batting an eye

      to be fair i've actually never seen anyone bat their eye

1.19.24  10:12 pm   thoughts on misanthropy?

      never heard of it

1.19.24  9:58 pm   dear bill, thank you for making nice music it helps me a lot in my life

      you're welcome

1.19.24  9:48 pm   where would you say you're vacationing right now?

      some kind of layer cake

1.19.24  9:47 pm   Is there a song I should listen to?

     no, but there are many many songs you may listen to

     If so, which one?

     making that decision for you is not something i could or should be responsible for

     I will drop everything and listen to it right now

      and that's exactly why

1.19.24  5:36 pm   i feel like i have too many thoughts and they are going to eat me before i can even get started have you ever felt like this

      yes

1.19.24  5:22 pm   have you ever despised any of your own characteristics that feel unchangeable?

     yes sometimes

     especially the characteristic "too lazy to try to change anything"?

     i don't find that to be one of my charactaristics, but i have some other ones that seem perhaps equally frustrating as that one

     is there anything to do about it?

     yes. it's possible that you can change this characteristic, or, it might also be possible that you don't have to. based on the way you described the situation, each of those 2 possibilities seems 50% likely

1.19.24  3:33 pm   how do i get more ideas

      just keep using the same idea

1.19.24  2:36 pm   can you make lasagna

      no

1.19.24  2:28 pm   is it normal to feel bad for someone but at the same time wish you were them?

      yes

1.19.24  2:23 pm   My cat stole my potato

      i believe you

1.19.24  10:08 am   when do you feel a sense of justice?

      when a flipped coin lands on its edge

1.19.24  9:36 am   what questions are worth asking?

      all of them. that is precisely what each question is worth

1.19.24  8:43 am   are you a rabbit in a hat

      metaphorically, yes

1.19.24  7:59 am   have you ever felt like you wanted to melt in to nature or reality spaces as an entity without having an important property enough to be noticed (as if you were invisible)

if you have or haven't felt that, would you try it once for real this time

      maybe some other time

1.19.24  6:49 am   how do you spell words in such a way that is incorrect but still perceivable as real words?

      just use all Q's

1.19.24  5:47 am   Hey, you seem like a pretty good guy. I'm studying for an exam. Should i quit or maybe keep going?

     i don't know anything about exams. if i were in the exam business i'd probably be the one making the exams

     How do you know if it is worth it?

     no one knows that

     And how do i know what i like?

     you won't know how you know but you will know

1.19.24  2:15 am   do you have any plans to make a song about frogs?

      no
